players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice's death is tragic. We need to analyze who benefits most from her being gone. Let's all share our thoughts."
Charlie: "I think we should all share our thoughts openly. Bob, your idea is solid—maybe start with who seems off today."
Charlie: "Bob, good point. Diana, your input was brief—any suspicions?"
You: "I noticed Diana was very quiet in the first round. Diana, do you have any suspicions or thoughts on Alice's death?"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
